pages.title: St. of Occluded Summons
pages.text: The Statue of Occluded Summons can be used to disable the $(l:circle_magic/transposition/summon_creature)Rite of Transposition$(/l) that can summon a player, if the player is in the vicinity of the statue. If a player murders another within the area of effect of the statue, they will no longer receive its protection.
